parameters.name: DtsJobId
parameters.description: The ID of the data migration, data synchronization, or change tracking task.

parameters.name: DtsJobName
parameters.description:
The new name of the DTS task.

>  We recommend that you specify a descriptive name for easy identification. You do not need to use a unique name.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region in which the DTS instance resides. For more information, see [List of supported regions](~~141033~~).
